WorkItem.Description:
Hi!
 
If RowDetailsTemplate contains AccessText unhandled exception is produced by DataGridDetailsPresenter. IsInVisualSubTree() method on mouse down. Here is the source code to reproduce the issue:
 
<Window x:Class="WpfApplication2.Window1"
    xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
    xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
    xmlns:Controls="clr-namespace:Microsoft.Windows.Controls;assembly=WPFToolkit"
    xmlns:System="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib"
    xmlns:Collections="clr-namespace:System.Collections;assembly=mscorlib"
    Title="Window1" Height="300" Width="300">
	<Window.Resources>
		<Collections:ArrayList x:Key="TestData">
			<System:String>Hello</System:String>
		</Collections:ArrayList>
	</Window.Resources>
    <Grid>
		<Controls:DataGrid ItemsSource="{StaticResource TestData}"
											 RowDetailsVisibilityMode="Visible">	
			<Controls:DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate>
				<DataTemplate>
					<AccessText Text="_Click me" />					
				</DataTemplate>
			</Controls:DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate>
		</Controls:DataGrid>
	</Grid>
</Window>
WorkItem.Summary: DataGrid: Unhandled exception caused by DataGridDetailsPresenter
